trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件非常有用，如果你想要显示由行的当前状态或它包含的值的快捷菜单。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>指定处理程序中的快捷菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击某一行除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件替代被单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击某一行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用行的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>为多行值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `rowIndex` parameter value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用`rowIndex`参数值来初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: 行的索引。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex为小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the row that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引发的行的快捷菜单<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: 此属性最初包含值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性如果设置为的行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在请求的快捷菜单行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve additional information about the row.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性可检索有关行的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 正在请求的快捷菜单行的从零开始索引。
